betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The interest these invaders have for dimensional shards is truly staggering.
The nether caves of Terra contain lots of them, and yet nobody was able to tell me a use for these gems.
'King' BamBamBam wanted to cut out some sort of supply chain that came from the nether caves.
I guess greed guides us all, and yet, not even BamBamBam seemed to know what to do with these shards, he just wanted to hold on to them...
Aren't they just shiny rocks? I really don't get the excitement. I guess they are rare, but shouldn't they also be useful to cause entire galaxies to try and do war here?
